item.title: Org-Mode does it all
item.description: Org really does it all Someone on Hacker News posted a link yesterday to a productivity directory of apps for, of all things, productivity. It’s a nice enough website presenting apps such as Things, Evernote, Toggl, etc… Naturally, however, I’m (once again) hit by the realisation that Org Mode (and Emacs) literally does all of this in one “package”, so to speak. It’s fairly impressive when you think about it, just how powerful it all is.
